divs: Sighting DetailsI had stepped outside to smoke my friends (name deleted)fg and (name deleted)fg were over for dinner and still inside when realizing i was outside they all headed outside into the backyard we were out there for about 5-10 min when i saw a ball of fire over (name deleted)fg shoulder while in conversation not really thinking twice about it ive seen many shooting stars but it didn't look much like an astroid or debri it looked like a giant roman candle a few seconds after seeing it max was the 1st to bring it to everyones attention by the time we all looked there were several of them flying in staggered pairs or 3's appearing to be over 540 coming from the south possibly even the airport ,oddly enough, their were about 15-20 of them all with a different path some of them went from south to west over wedington and they went from the tree line in my back yard from south to north making it out of sight in about 45 seconds and were grouped very close we tried taking picures none of which came out that well they seemed to be pretty low altitude and the lights were far bigger than that of a planes flashing lights you couldn't see anything around the lights just balls of fire with no sound no tracers and odd flight taking sharp corners almost swaying back and forth it is hard to put in words how much differently they were than conventional flight i live by the college and see planes and choppers all day long ive never seen anything like this and i would like to know if this is something thst others here or other locations have had similar sightings
Summary: Very close low altitude fire balls moving rapidly from south to north and west over 540 approx. 15-20 of them.
